name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Product-aware Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong expertise in **Java**, **Kotlin**, **Groovy**, and **Spring Boot**, complementing my robust skills in **NodeJS** and **React** to build high-performance applications. I am proficient in implementing **microservices architecture** and **RESTful Web Services**, ensuring scalable and maintainable solutions tailored to organizational needs. With hands-on experience in cloud services like **AWS** and containerization tools such as **Docker**, I have streamlined deployments and enhanced operational efficiency.

My technical acumen extends to **PostgreSQL** for effective data modeling, alongside experience in **Jenkins** and **Terraform** for CI/CD automation. I actively engage in Agile methodologies, collaborating with cross-functional teams to solve complex software challenges efficiently. Additionally, my background includes proficiency in **Python** for versatile programming tasks, alongside **Quarkus** for optimized Java applications. I thrive in dynamic environments, leveraging problem-solving skills and product awareness to deliver innovative solutions.
